snippet.title: Curtain - DREAMFEEEL
snippet.description:
Curtain is a pixelated first person narrative game that deals with a complex and abusive relationship. Explore the game and piece together the story from what you find: diaries, newspapers, text messages. At the same time an ever present narrator watches and comments on every thought, and the player is coercively subsumed into their world. 

Selected for IndieCade 2014.

Download: http://dreamfeel.itch.io/curtain
